name: Coin Matcher Puzzle
description:
Here is a puzzle game to kill our time. The game is very simple and intuitive, you should match the pair chips / coins of same color and same number. While matching the chips / coins, ensure you cover all the empty cells.

The game has around 300 puzzles, and three type of boards (5 X 5, 6 X 6, 7 X 7). As you solve through puzzles, the complexity also increases.

Please do rate the app and leave your valuable review comments.
